locale.message: This plugin submits article references to Crossref when a DOI is registered and automatically displays DOIs for references found in Crossref's database.

This plugin will automatically add the extracted article references to the DOI registration with Crossref. Crossref will then automatically check if any DOIs can be found for the submitted references. Shortly after that, you can use the plugin to check for the found references DOIs, either automatically (if the appropriate option is set in the Crossref Export Plugin) or manually in the submission metadata tab "References".
If you change an article's references after registering the DOI, you will need to register the article's DOI again and check again for the article references' DOIs.

This plugin requires an article to be assigned a Crossref DOI and this DOI must be deposited with Crossref from within OJS. Article references can be provided in the Metadata section in the submission workflow.
Crossref username and password must be configured:
Submission references metadata must be enabled:
To be able to check for the Crossref references DOIs you need to
assign a DOI to the article
register this article DOI together with the extracted references with Crossref
Use the button below to check Crossref for reference DOIs.
